title: Google Chrome security advisory (AV25-369)
description: On June 24, 2025, Google published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Stable Channel Chrome for Desktop   versions prior to138.0.7204.49/50 (Windows/Mac), and 138.0.7204.49 (Linux)
Extended Stable Channel   versions prior to 138.0.7204.50 (Windows/Mac)
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
